title: The waves are wild and ferocious
content:
The waves are wild and ferocious
Like an animal caged too long,now set free
I hear them this day through the crack
In my window, sounds of their crashing
Tells me Iâ€™m alive, that once my heart
Raced and faltered, now blood flows
More evenly through my body,
Healing renewing with the night

* Photo by David Clapp
